aboutUs: In the modern world, it is hard to imagine our lives without mobile devices, we carry them everywhere we walk, we communicate using them and to communicate well we do need to be able to type different texts sometimes. This game was created in order to let users improve their typing skills and to do that in the most enjoyable way possible - through competing with other players! Our app offers you to get matched with players from different parts of the world, and decide who is the fastest and the most accurate player. What's good about this game is that you can play it at your free time and absolutely for free!
